item.title: What to eat
item.description: Foods to be discarded: Sugar and all kinds of sweets (marmalade, marshmallows, sweets, cake, ice cream). Cereals (wheat, rice, barley). Vegetable oil. (berries are allowed, in a minimum amount); Legumes (green bean pods are allowed); Root vegetables (beets, carrots, potatoes); Dietary options, for example, low-fat cottage cheese; Sauces, gravy containing starch, flour; Alcoholic drinks. Ideal foods for diet: Meat and all its types; Seafood, including fish; Eggs Vegetables containing a minimum of carbohydrates (bell pepper, eggplant, tomatoes); Dairy products (cheese, butter, fatty cottage cheese); Nuts Mushrooms; Oils (coconut, olive); Spices, spices.

item.title: Benefit for Health.
item.description: Based on the ketogenic diet, the well-being of people with obvious neurological problems improve. Practice shows that the number of symptoms of epilepsy, Alzheimer’s, and Parkinson’s has been reduced. This refers to effective methods of anti-cancer therapy. Because these cells feed on sugar, its significant reduction leads to the death of malignant cells. The condition of the skin improves, acne disappears. A decrease in insulin helps to get rid of chronic inflammation that affects the skin gradually.
